post:
Hi

I have a server in Swiftway, hire him 2 months to get an offer published by them, but now I do not need the server. Servers are in NL are somewhat expensive so usually someone will be interested in this offer.

The server is currently running directadmin. (the value includes the payment of the license)

Supermicro with KVM/IP

Xeon E3-1230

16GB RAM

1x500GB HDD

DirectAdmin license

5 usable IPv4 address

100Mbps unmetered port

Location NL.


35.00EUR

PD:The server expires the 24th, if interested 5EUR I return to you, for the two days that have passed
